item.title: [RS2] LevExidus AutoTalker V.1
item.dc:creator: @Shadower Shadower
item.description:
@Shadower wrote:

just go file - open - the file you want.

BTW, to add random you do this:

procedure LetusSPAM;
begin
  Case 1+ Random(3)of
    1: typesend(Sentence1);

    2: typesend(Sentence2 );

    3: typesend(Sentence3 );
  end;

This will make it randomly choose between 3 sentences

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2] LevExidus AutoTalker V.1
item.dc:creator: @Shadower Shadower
item.description:
@Shadower wrote:

It is used to indent your code so that its easier to read. Using the tool, if I indented your code it would look like:

program AutoTalker;
{.Include SRL/SRL.Scar}

const
  Talk = 'What you want to say'; //what to say
  TWait = 1000; //time to wait after typing

procedure TalkOn;
begin
  repeat
    Wait(TWait + random(700));
    TypeSend(Talk); // types text in talk and presses enter
  until (false); //False = never ends
end;

begin
  repeat
    TalkOn;
  until (false) //keeps going until true... wich i cant remember what true is.. =(
end.

Read full topic

Indenting too. It’s like how you always put two finger spacings at the start of every paragraph. Various links:

http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/scar-script-official-t3997.html

item.title: [RS2] LevExidus AutoTalker V.1
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

Ok first off this is for rs2, everyone does the same mistake you use sendkeys, that will get you banned the first time you use it so just put{.include srl/srl.scar} under program new and use typesend(Talk); instead ofSendKeysSilent(Talk+chr(13))that way you wont get banned next you need to change the until(true) to until(false) because it wont be true until you tell it is next you must get rid of the : in the Talk and TWait and add a semicolon ; after each const or in other words this is the script[code]program AutoTalker;
{.Include SRL/SRL.Scar}
const
Talk=‘What you want to say’; //what to say
TWait=1000;//time to wait after typing

procedure TalkOn;
begin
repeat
Wait(TWait+random(700));
SendKeysSilent(Talk+chr(13)); // types text in talk and presses enter
until(false); //False = never ends
end;

begin
repeat
TalkOn;
until(false) //keeps going until true… wich i cant remember what true is… =(
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2] LevExidus AutoTalker V.1
item.dc:creator: @jvwarrior jvwarrior
item.description:
@jvwarrior wrote:

AutoTalker By LevExidus (Me) V.1

{Be Sure To Check Out LevExidus AutoTalker V.2! Find it in the SCAR Runescape Scripts}

It was edited so it is WORKING! Tested Like A Million Times So It IS Working.

[code]program AutoTalker;
{.Include SRL/SRL.Scar}
const
Talk=‘Flash1:Text Here’; //what to say
TWait=2000;//time to wait after typing

procedure TalkOn;
begin
repeat
Wait(TWait+random(700));
typesend(Talk); // types text in talk and presses enter… Must remember SendKeysSilent will get me banned.
until(false); //False = never ends
end;

begin
repeat
TalkOn;
until(false) //keeps going forever
end.[/code]

Im working on a multi AutoTalker look for AutoTalker V.2 in RS2 scripts.

Is it possible to input sentences and words and have SCAR just randomly pick one and use it?

Read full topic
